verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
You've kept watch over me
since I was a child.
You've stayed close when my heart
has gone running wild.
You've welcomed me back
again and again.
You've offered Your kindness,
forgiven my sin.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
You're the source of all the good gifts I know;
No one else can equal the love You show.
Though my praise for You often comes so slow,
How I long for my life with You to grow.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
In Your actions, You show
the proof of Your care.
In Your presence comes comfort;
You're ev'rywhere.
In Your mercy, I find
hope that will last.
In Your second life,
I am saved from my past.
